content: in this legal case a person named gop filed a request with the gorizia court the court rejected gops exceptions and deductions and made a final ruling the court declared the dissolution of a real estate community and ordered the assignment of specific lots they also ordered the transfer of a certain amount of money to a bank account which will be divided equally among three coheirs the court based its decision on various articles of the civil code and the civil procedure code the case involved the division of an estate after the death of mrs ro so and her holographic will assigning ownership to her two sons one son gu bo sued his brother gi bo requesting the division of the estate according to their allocated shares the court granted the petition and declared the wills signature to be valid however gi bo appealed the decision and the court of appeal declared the estate to be divided equally among the three brothers bo then challenged the judgment and requested further verification the court ordered a valuation of the estate and examination of bank accounts a divisional plan was prepared but objections were raised by gi bo the court revoked an earlier order and allowed for the preparation of lots for division finally the court assigned specific lots to each heir and determined the proportion of costs to be borne by each party the courts decision is enforceable by law
